definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: Oh, great. What kind of consulting company?
sentences.chinese: 哦，好棒。什么样的顾问公司？

sentences.english: Good Job , but we need Tejas too fully developed and equal lethal version.
sentences.chinese: 好棒，但是我们也需要成熟和同样致命的光辉战机。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
(slang) come on, you can't deny it!/don't you think so?!/(melodramatic form of 有沒有|有没有)
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
to work as a carter or porter/to transport goods for a living (esp. by donkey)
final particle expressing exhortation, admiration etc
